episode: I am excited for this upcoming Easter.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am excited for this upcoming Easter.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! Do you have any special plans?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We always go to my Dad

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like a great tradition! What do you usually do there?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: all of my sisters and nephews and there family go to my Dad's land out in the country

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a blast! Bet it's a fun time with everyone there.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it is very fun. We cook barbecue, go fishing and shoot guns.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds amazing! Can't beat good food and outdoor fun.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I is very fun to be out in the country. Plus I get to plant my tomato plants too.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! Fresh tomatoes are the best.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope this year I have a good yeild. The past two years have been tough due to the heat and lack of rain

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Hope the weather cooperates this year! Fingers crossed for a great harvest.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: thanks. Also I get to see my new Great Nephew

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! Bet he's adorable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I seen pictures of him, he is very cute

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Can't wait to meet him in person!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, It will be a great Easter

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like it'll be awesome!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope the weather is good

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fingers crossed for sunshine!
